title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 322 - Payment Of The Ordinary Death Benefit Upon The Death Of Certain Retirees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 322 - Payment Of The Ordinary Death Benefit Upon The Death Of Certain Retirees

State Regulations
§ 322.1 - Background
§ 322.2 - Payment of the ordinary death benefit upon the death of certain retirees

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 322

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§11, 90, 311, 390

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
